name: growing-up
description: koa learning record, develop growing up background

scripts.server: npx babel src --out-dir dist && node dist/index.js
scripts.dev: npx babel src --watch --out-dir dist & npx nodemon dist/index.js
scripts.pro-start: npx babel src --out-dir dist && forever start dist/index.js
scripts.pro-restart: npx babel src --out-dir dist && forever start dist/index.js

author: YlonelY
